content: Adds a `Enum.InputActionType.ViewportPosition|ViewportPosition` action type to the Input Action System.
Fixes an issue with Input Action System mouse bindings triggering on touch and VR.
In the new Luau Type Solver, removed the ICE which occured when the Constraint Generator hit a recursion limit.
Adds a new `Class.Instance` type called `Class.TextGenerator` that provides a method for getting LLM-generated text.
Fixes an infrequent error in the Luau typechecking that could cause type inference to fail when typechecking generics with default parameters
Adds the `Class.AudioTremolo` instance, which works the same as `Class.TremoloSoundEffect` but for newer audio classes such as `Class.AudioPlayer` and `Class.Wire`.
Improves adaptive reverb in the Acoustic Simulation beta feature.
Right-to-left text support is now permanently enabled.
Fix a bug where the New Luau Type Solver was not warning on incorrect use of a generic function.
Fixes handling of triggers on Xbox Elite controller in the Xbox app.
Luau native code generation has been improved to avoid cases of lowering failures on arm64. One failure case was compiling certain hashing algorithm implementations like Blake2b.
Audio Discovery tool now works with contemporary randomized assetIds and AudioPlayers.
Fix a bug where the New Luau Type Solver would incorrectly warn on certain valid uses of xpcall.
Fix a case where the New Luau Type Solver could erroneously warn when passing a table literal to a function.
Improves error messages for uninstantiated generic types in scripts typechecked with the new solver.
Improves error message for incompatible generic types in scripts typechecked with the new solver.
Fixes a crash in Roblox Studio that occurred when using the "Compare Package Versions" feature with packages containing UIDragDetector objects.
